title: Jooble Job Scraper
description: Scrape job listings from Jooble.org. Provide either start URLs or a search query. Actor paginates and optionally scrapes detail pages.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Jooble search result URL. If provided, this will override searchQuery.

searchQuery.title: Search query (if not using Start URLs)
searchQuery.description: Keyword for job search, e.g., 'admin'. Will be used as the 'ukw' parameter in Jooble search URLs.

location.title: Location (if not using Start URLs)
location.description: Location filter for Jooble search results (leave empty for broader results).

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper visits job detail pages to extract full description and JSON-LD.

maxItems.title: Maximum number of jobs
maxItems.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Default is 100.

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw 'Cookie' header string. Can help bypass consent banners.

cookiesJson.title: Custom cookies (JSON)
cookiesJson.description: Optional JSON-formatted cookies. Accepts an array (e.g., [{"name":"a","value":"1"}]) or an object map (e.g., {"a":"1"}).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings (use Apify Proxy for best results).
